biotools.summary:
a open-source web application for the organisation of large scale biological treasure hunts.

This repository contain the source code of the web application. The web application is developped in R and uses the Shiny package. The app can be installed on a Shiny server and used to play the QuoVidi game.

QuoVidi (previously known as BioGO) is an interface to manage large (and small) scale treasure hunt. It was intially designed to organise a biological treasure hunt, but can be adapted to any situations.
